timers.name: Shadowbringers Early Access
timers.note: End time is by server region and is displayed here for the Japanese data centers (JST) as that is the earliest end time. European data centers will end nine hours after that, and North American data centers will end an additional seven hours after the EU data centers.

timers.name: Shadowbringers
timers.comment: It's unclear when the official release time is, but midnight PDT works
